typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	limit: 100,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	entity: '/eCommerce_eCommercePurchases',
	format: 'cdm',
	manifestType: 'model',
	folderPath: 'CustomerInsights_e053ffe7-796e-4bcf-ab0f-923857e6ba77/BKW Dataplattform',
	fileSystem: 'crm-data') ~> source1
source1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,

	format: 'inline',
	output: false,
	saveOrder: 1) ~> sink1
